postCreateCommand.git: apt-get update; echo 'deb http://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-backports main' > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/bullseye-backports.list; apt update; apt install -y git/bullseye-backports ssh-client patch less git-man/bullseye-backports
postCreateCommand.python-bulid: python3 -m pip install --upgrade build; python3 -m pip install --upgrade twine
postCreateCommand.python-alias: echo 'alias push="python3 -m twine upload -u __token__ -p $$PYPI_TOKEN dist/*"; alias build="python3 -m build"' > ~/.bashrc
